metadata.name: Linux HackTool Execution
metadata.comment: Detects known hacktool execution based on image name.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/crackmapexec')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/havoc')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/merlin-agent')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/merlinserver-linux-x64')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/msfconsole')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/msfvenom')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/ps-empire server')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/ps-empire')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/sliver-client')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/sliver-server')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/villain.py')) OR contains(lower(process.name), lower('/cobaltstrike')) OR contains(lower(process.name), lower('/teamserver')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/autorecon')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/httpx')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/legion')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/naabu')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/netdiscover')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/nuclei')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/recon-ng')) OR contains(lower(process.name), lower('/sniper')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/dirb')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/dirbuster')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/eyewitness')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/feroxbuster')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/ffuf')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/gobuster')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/wfuzz')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/whatweb')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/joomscan')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/nikto')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/wpscan')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/aircrack-ng')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/bloodhound-python')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/bpfdos')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/ebpfki')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/evil-winrm')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/hashcat')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/hoaxshell.py')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/hydra')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/john')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/ncrack')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/nxc-ubuntu-latest')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/pidhide')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/pspy32')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/pspy32s')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/pspy64')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/pspy64s')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/setoolkit')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/sqlmap')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/writeblocker')) OR contains(lower(process.name), lower('/linpeas'))))
